Module com.example.pt2025_30422_larisa_pasca_assignment_3
Package dataAccess

Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.AbstractDAO<Product>
dataAccess.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO extends AbstractDAO<Product>
Data Access Object for the Product entity. Extends AbstractDAO and provides additional methods for stock validation and modification.

  • Method Details

    • checkStock

      public boolean checkStock(int productId, int quantity) throws SQLException
      Checks if there is sufficient stock available for a given product.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the given product
      quantity - the desired quantity to check for
      Returns:
      true if there is enough stock available and false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • decrementStock

      public void decrementStock(int productId, int quantity) throws SQLException
      Decrements the stock for a given product by the desired quantity.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the product
      quantity - the amount to decrement
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is insufficient stock or the product ID is invalid
